landing.noapp: Awudingi usetyenziso lokusebenzisa {{ BRAND }} kwifowuni yakho okanye ithebhulethi! Iwebhusayithi isebenza kakuhle kwiselula.
landing.intro: {{BRAND}} ({{TRANSLITERATION}}) yindlela entle yokudibana nabahlobo abatsha. Xa usebenzisa i- {{ BRAND }}, sikhetha omnye umntu ngokungakhethiyo kwaye sikuvumela ukuba uthethe-enye-enye. Ukukunceda uhlale ukhuselekile, iincoko aziziwa ngaphandle kokuba uxelele umntu ukuba ungubani (akukhuthazwa!), kwaye unokuyeka incoko nangaliphi na ixesha. Bona <6>Imigaqo nemiqathango</6> yethu, kunye <8>Izikhokelo zoluntu</8> ngolwazi malunga nokwenza kunye nongakwenza xa usebenzisa i- {{ BRAND }}. {{ BRAND }} incoko yevidiyo imodareyithwa yi-AI kodwa akukho lumodareyitha olugqibeleleyo. Abasebenzisi banoxanduva lokuziphatha kwabo ngelixa besebenzisa i- {{ BRAND }}
landing.disclaimer: <0>Kufuneka ube neminyaka eyi-18 (okanye uninzi olusemthethweni kwindawo yakho) okanye ngaphezulu ukuze usebenzise {{BRAND}}</0>. Bona {{BRAND}}'s <4>Imigaqo nemiqathango</4> ngolwazi oluthe kratya. Ukhuseleko lwabazali olunokuthi luncede abazali lufumaneke kurhwebo kwaye ungafumana ulwazi oluthe kratya ku <6>https://www.connectsafely.org/controls</6> ngokunjalo nakwezinye iisayithi.
landing.pleaseleave: Nceda ushiye iLamdazle kwaye undwendwele indawo yabantu abadala endaweni yoko ukuba yiloo nto uyifunayo kwaye uneminyaka eyi-18 (okanye uninzi olusemthethweni kwindawo yakho) okanye ngaphezulu.
landing.termscheck: Ngokujonga ibhokisi uyavuma ukuba uye waphonononga ukuvuma ukubotshelelwa yi {{BRAND}}'s <3>Imigaqo nemiqathango</3>, <5>umgaqo-nkqubo wabucala</5> kunye <7>nezikhokelo zoluntu</7 >.
landing.agecheck: Awunakuyisebenzisa le nkonzo ukuba ungaphantsi kweminyaka eyi-18 okanye ubudala bobuninzi obusemthethweni kwindawo yakho. Bona yethu <1>Imigaqo nemiqathango</1> ngolwazi oluthe kratya. <3>Ngokujonga ibhokisi uyavuma kwaye umele ukuba uneminyaka eyi-18 (okanye uninzi olusemthethweni kwindawo yakho) okanye ngaphezulu.</3>

chat.error: Impazamo yokudibanisa kwiseva: Nceda uzame kwakhona

search.random: Ukhangela umntu ongamaziyo onokuthi uncokole naye...
search.retry: Oku kuthatha ixesha elide, ukujonga umntu ongamaziyo endaweni...

chat.searching: Ukhangela umntu ongamaziyo onokuthi uncokole naye...
chat.language: Nobabini nithetha ulwimi olunye. Khetha {{"Any"}} kwimenyu yolwimi ukuze ungasebenzi.
chat.simulated: Umntu ongamaziyo usenokuba usebenzisa ikhamera yewebhu eyenziweyo

alerts.keepclean: Yigcine icocekile kwaye uncede ngokuxela ukuziphatha kwe-NSFW
alerts.banreason: Ngenxa yesimilo esibi. Ungakhathazeki, ukuvinjwa akusayi kuhlala ngonaphakade.

error.adblocker: Asinakukuvumela ukuba wenze loo nto kuba usebenzisa i-Ad blocker
error.disableadblocker: <0>Sinethemba lokuba uyonwabela iwebhusayithi yethu. Ukuze uqhubeke nokuyisebenzisa, singathanda ukukucela ukuba uvale i-adblocker yakho ngobubele. Iwebhusayithi yethu inokusetyenziswa simahla, kwaye iintengiso eziboniswe kwiwebhusayithi yethu zisinceda ukuba sihlawule iindleko zokuqhuba le nkonzo. Ngokuvala i-adblocker yakho, uya kube usinceda ekugcineni iwebhusayithi yethu isebenza.</0><1>Enkosi ngenkxaso yakho!</1>
